description:
Lola Panda does it again – making it
fun to develop logical thinking! Now
kids can enjoy the fun and challenge
of Sudoku in a form especially
designed for them. Lola’s Fruit Shop
Sudoku game is playable even by
4 year old children, yet still
challenging enough for 8-9 year old
kids.
name: Lola's Fruit Shop Sudoku
